thread.title: Digital Turbine to Participate at the Craig-Hallum Alpha Select Conference on September 17, 2015
thread.title_full: Digital Turbine to Participate at the Craig-Hallum Alpha Select Conference on September 17, 2015

author: admin
title: Digital Turbine to Participate at the Craig-Hallum Alpha Select Conference on September 17, 2015
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Digital Turbine, Inc. 
AUSTIN, Texas, Sept. 10, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Digital Turbine, Inc . (Nasdaq: APPS), the company empowering operators and Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) around the globe with end-to-end mobile solutions, today announced that members of its management team are scheduled to participate at the 6th Annual Craig-Hallum Alpha Select Conference at the Convene Conference Center in New York on September 17, 2015. 
Bill Stone, chief executive officer, and Andrew Schleimer, chief financial officer, are scheduled to present at 10:40am ET on that date. Messrs. Stone and Schleimer will also host one-on-one meetings at the conference throughout the day. 
A live webcast and replay will be available in the investor relations section of Digital Turbine's website at ( http://ir.digitalturbine.com/events ) 
About Digital Turbine 
Digital Turbine works at the convergence of media and mobile communications, delivering end-to-end products and solutions for mobile operators, app advertisers, device OEMs and other third parties to enable them to effectively monetize mobile content and acquire higher value users. The company's products include DT Ignite(TM), a mobile device management solution with targeted app distribution capabilities, DT IQ(TM), a customized user experience and app discovery tool, DT Marketplace(TM), an application and content store, and DT Pay(TM), a content management and mobile payment solution. Offerings also include DT Media, an advertiser solution for unique and exclusive carrier inventory, and Appia, a leading worldwide mobile user acquisition network. Digital Turbine has delivered more than 100 million app installs for hundreds of advertisers. In addition, more than 31 million customers use Digital Turbine's solutions each month across more than 20 global operators. The company is headquartered in Austin, Texas with global offices in Durham, Berlin, Singapore, Sydney and Tel Aviv. For additional information visit http://www.digitalturbine.com/ or connect with Digital Turbine on Twitter at @DigitalTurbine .
